questions.question: Which fish species is not native to Yellowstone?
questions.info: Lake trout are extremely invasive and detrimental towards native fish populations. Lake trout can eat up to 41 cutthroat trout per year.

questions.question: Yellowstone Lake is the largest high elevation lake in North America.  High elevation lakes are at or above this elevation (in feet above sea level):
questions.info: Yellowstone Lake is 7,733 feet above sea level.

questions.question: Yellowstone Lake often freezes over in late December and usually doesn't thaw until May or June.  Its average water temperature is just 41°F (5°C).  How long can a human survive in water at that temperature (in minutes)?
